uk.ac.aber.guidedwalk.model

Class Walk

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.aber.guidedwalk.model.Walk

  • public class Walk
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the information relating a single walk.
    Author:
    Karl Parry (kdp8)

      • getWalkDifficulty

        public int getWalkDifficulty()
        This method gets the difficulty of the walk. 0 = easy. 1 = normal. 2 = hard.
        Returns:
        the walk difficulty. 0 = easy. 1 = normal. 2 = hard.
